name: Echoes of Illynia
description:
[[ REQUIRES RUNTIME PACKAGE HERE: http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages ]]

Echoes of Illynia is an RPG that tells the story of a young man, Lucien Klein, and his closest friend Jude Gainsford: two members of the GAIA Organization with the intent to protect the precious world of Illynia from a mysterious cult that yearns for its destruction. The people of this world are granted "Illynia's boon", allowing them to make lifelong pacts with elemental spirits known as Phasmas. The duo and their Phasmas are sent on a special assignment to the depths of the Voiceless Quarry, where they locate a young amnesiac named Maya, and a dangerous Phasmic phenomenon known as Demys, who forcefully resides within Maya's heart and serves as a threat to the outside world. Lucien, Jude and Maya, along with numerous quirky companions on the way, travel together with the hopes of discovering her origins and the source of Demys. However, they may just end up learning more than anyone could have ever anticipated, and this adventure will change their lives forever.

With an original & emotional music score delivered by a number of very talented composers, unique gameplay mechanics to twist the norm of "turn-based combat", a massive world full of lore to uncover, and dynamic characters to experience the story with, Echoes of Illynia is a passion-project by classic RPG fans, for classic RPG fans.
